subject: World Series
Baseball
Gambling
Fenway Park (Boston)
Bribery and Kickbacks
Cheating
lead_paragraph: No documented proof exists, but there are suspicions that the Cubs-Red Sox series may have been fixed, largely because the conditions were ripe for a bribe, as they were in 1919.
snippet: No documented proof exists, but there are suspicions that the Cubs-Red Sox series may have been fixed, largely because the conditions were ripe for a bribe, as they were in 1919.
